attributes.action: Request that those in charge of the 2012 Olympic Games select a more suitable logo for the event
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/2012-Emblem/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
